title: The Ghost Walker
description: A new Arapaho Indian mystery from Margaret Coel, the nationally bestselling author Tony Hillerman called a master. Father John O'Malley return to solve another murder near the Arapaho Indian reservation in Wyoming. O'Malley was sure he had seen a body in the snow one frigid night. But when he returned with the authorities, the corpse had vanished--leaving only suspicion and doubt behind.
author: Margaret Coel
